name: Mausoleum_Mage

skills.name: Soul Manacles
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 30% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns.

effects.notes: Single-hit. 4.6x ATK multiplier base (5.4 ATK fully booked with +15% damage).
30% base chance (50% booked) to place 30% Dec SPD. Useful for TM control.

skills.book_value: Low: +15% damage, +20% Dec SPD chance (30%→50%). Not priority.
skills.notes: Single-hit A1. 50% Dec SPD chance when booked. Low priority for booking.

skills.name: Might of Undeath
skills.description: Places a [Block Debuffs] buff on all allies for 1 turn. Also places a 30% [Increase C.RATE] buff and a 60% [Increase DEF] buff on all allies for 2 turns.

effects.notes: Block Debuffs for 1 turn. Protects team from crowd control and debuffs for 1 turn.
30% Inc C.RATE buff for 2 turns. Excellent for teams without 100% C.RATE (boosts C.RATE by 30%).
60% Inc DEF buff for 2 turns. Excellent team survivability boost.

skills.book_value: CRITICAL: -1 cooldown (4→3). MUST BOOK for Block Debuffs uptime in Clan Boss and dungeons.
skills.notes: PRIMARY SUPPORT SKILL: Block Debuffs (1 turn) + Inc C.RATE (30%, 2 turns) + Inc DEF (60%, 2 turns). MUST BOOK for 3-turn cooldown. EXCELLENT for Clan Boss (Block Debuffs protection from Stun) and dungeons (debuff protection). Inc C.RATE synergy with damage dealers.

skills.name: Winds of Purging
skills.description: Removes all debuffs from all allies, then heals all allies by 10% of this Champion's MAX HP. Heals each ally by a further 10% if 1 or more debuffs are removed from that ally. Fills each ally's Turn Meter by 15% if 2 or more debuffs are removed from that ally.

effects.notes: Removes ALL debuffs from all allies. Full cleanse (not just 1-2 debuffs). EXCELLENT for heavy debuff content (Doom Tower, Faction Wars, Clan Boss Stun).
Heals all allies by 10% Mausoleum Mage MAX HP base (13% booked with +30% heal). At 50K HP: 5K base heal (6.5K booked).
Additional 10% MAX HP heal (13% booked) if 1+ debuffs removed from ally. Total: 20% MAX HP base (26% booked) if debuffs removed. At 50K HP: 10K base heal (13K booked).
+15% TM per ally if 2+ debuffs removed. Excellent for Clan Boss and debuff-heavy content (TM boost after cleanse).

skills.book_value: CRITICAL: +30% heal, -1 cooldown (5→4). MUST BOOK for heal scaling and cooldown reduction.
skills.notes: CLEANSE SPECIALIST: Removes ALL debuffs from all allies + heals 10% MAX HP base (20% if debuffs removed) + TM boost (15% if 2+ debuffs removed). MUST BOOK for 4-turn cooldown and +30% heal boost. EXCELLENT for Clan Boss (Stun cleanse), Doom Tower (debuff cleanse), and Faction Wars. Build 50000+ HP for max heal value.

forms.comments: Block Debuffs + cleanse specialist. A2 'Might of Undeath' provides Block Debuffs (1 turn) + Inc C.RATE (30%) + Inc DEF (60%). A3 'Winds of Purging' is full team cleanse + heal + TM boost. EXCELLENT for Clan Boss (9/10) with Block Debuffs protection from Stun. Good for dungeons (8/10), Doom Tower (8/10), and Faction Wars (8/10) with debuff protection and cleanse. Must book A2/A3 for 3-turn A2, 4-turn A3 cooldowns.

stat_priority_recommendations.clan_boss: PRIORITY: 220+ SPD (speed tuning for Block Debuffs before Stun), 50000+ HP (heal value), 200+ ACC (Dec SPD if needed), 2000+ DEF (survivability), 100+ RES (resist debuffs). A2 Block Debuffs CRITICAL for Stun protection (must use before Stun turn). Immortal or Speed sets.
stat_priority_recommendations.dungeons: PRIORITY: 220+ SPD (Block Debuffs cycling), 50000+ HP (heal value), 200+ ACC (Dec SPD), 2000+ DEF (survivability). A2 Block Debuffs + A3 cleanse excellent for debuff-heavy dungeons (Dragon, Ice Golem). Speed or Immortal sets.
stat_priority_recommendations.arena: 200+ SPD (speed tuning), 50000+ HP (heal value), 2000+ DEF, 150+ RES (resist debuffs). A2 Block Debuffs + Inc C.RATE + Inc DEF good for tanky Arena teams. Not top-tier for Arena (7/10) but usable.
stat_priority_recommendations.faction_wars: PRIORITY: 220+ SPD, 50000+ HP (heal value CRITICAL for sustain), 200+ ACC (Dec SPD), 2000+ DEF (survivability). A2 Block Debuffs + A3 cleanse excellent for debuff-heavy boss waves. Must book A2/A3 for Undead Hordes FW progression.

recommended_gear: Speed (220+ SPD for Block Debuffs cycling)

masteries.general: WARMASTER for all content (single-hit A1). Healing Savior CRITICAL (+30% A3 heal boost for massive team healing, synergizes with 50K+ HP build). Cycle of Magic CRITICAL (reduces A2 4→3 booked, A3 5→4 booked cooldowns for Block Debuffs + cleanse uptime). Eagle Eye (+50 ACC for Dec SPD). Deterrence (tanky support survivability). Unshakeable (+50 RES for debuff resistance in FW). MUST BOOK A2/A3 for 3-turn A2, 4-turn A3 cooldowns. Build: 50000+ HP (heal value), 220+ SPD (Block Debuffs cycling), 200+ ACC (Dec SPD), 2000+ DEF, 100+ RES. Speed or Immortal sets. Focus: Clan Boss (9/10) with Block Debuffs Stun protection. Good for dungeons (8/10), Doom Tower (8/10), Faction Wars (8/10) with debuff protection + cleanse. User Priority: Arena/Support (Priority 4) - Mausoleum Mage is BEST Epic support for Clan Boss with Block Debuffs. Force affinity = weak to Spirit but strong vs Magic.

blessings: Brimstone (if used in HP Burn teams - unlikely)
Cruelty (C.DMG boost - low priority for support)
